title: Software Engineer
description: At Indeed, I work as a part of our identity team, building and maintaining critical components of our authentication and authorization system that allows large employers to better organize their hiring efforts on our platform. I work closely with cross-functional teams such as design and product management to deliver stable, scalable software that meets the needs of our customers.

title: Software Developer
description: At InFlight, I helped to modernize HR platforms by building custom, user friendly, accessible applications that integrated with existing HR systems. After our acquisition by Skuid, I continued supporting our companies largest client throughout the transition.

title: Software Developer Intern / Software Developer
description: At WSFS, I worked on a team that built and maintained internal tools that supported different teams within the bank. I was responsible for building and designing new features, fixing bugs, and helping our department transition to React.
